function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on surrogate Z ur values for SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Inaccuracy in determining effectiveness of UVGI on SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Conduct additional studies with the actual virus to validate findings","Technologies":"Laboratory testing with live SARS-CoV-2 virus","People":"Research scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the effects of fragmented UV doses on virus inactivation","Impact":"Ineffective disinfection of viruses indoors","Mitigation":"Conduct research to determine the specific UV dose requirements for virus inactivation","Technologies":"Laboratory testing with fragmented UV doses","People":"Research scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Dependence on room air mixing for effective UVGI air disinfection","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of UVGI in poorly ventilated spaces","Mitigation":"Implement measures to improve room air mixing, such as ventilation system upgrades","Technologies":"Ventilation system upgrades, computational fluid dynamics modeling","People":"Building managers, engineers","Owner":"Building owners, management companies"}]}
